channel.title: ♠ Zerix 317| 24/7 ♠ ECO SERVER ♠ Daily Updates |Tons of Minigames| Brand New ♠
channel.description:
[center][B][I][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=7]http://www.zerix.net[/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B]
[center]Very stable source No dupes (Have had multiple testers) Bank with banktabs 24 Fully working skills PKP Shop Vote for reward Vote point shop Prestigeing for points Prestige shop Glacors Jadinkos 600+ Items Strykewyrm Quest Lunar Diplomacy Quest Desert Treasure Quest Fully working Flowers Duel Arena Fight Pits Fight Caves Pest Control Barrows Save teleports with naming Slayer system Boss tasks Corporeal Beast Nex Charming Imp All chaotics working PvP Armours and weapons Achievement System Max cape miniquest Completionist cape with requirements Clanchat Dicing Mithril seeds (Planting flowers) Well thought out economy 2 Starters per IP Plenty of shops for the starter X2 XP WEEKENDS Auto Donation System Skilling Tasks Skilling Point Shop Skilling Area Donators only area Donators only slayer dungeon Vanguard PKing with PK points and Killstreaks Loyalty Points Ape Atoll with agressive monkey archers and monkey guards Tab to reply Zoom in and out (F11 - F12) Keys
And a lot more![/center]
Developers Log! [code]Fixed Bank Forced Interface In Cheat Engine For Duel Dung Etc! Added Rev dung Will be multi later on! Fixed 2 Dupes! Fixed The ugly character models! Fixed The Firecape Model! Fixed The Bank Glitch with Pack Yak! Added Spirit shield effects! Nerfed Some of the Drops! Fixed some of the mapping! Fixed Getting Stuck In duel arena! Fixed The lagging Problem! Updated Cache To 3.2 Added the following Comp Cape requirements: 50 Player Kills, All Quests are now required to be completed Added a Farming teleport - talk to the Skill Master (only the herb patch works as of now) Made the Revenant caves a wilderness location Added staff crowns in clan chat removed 10x hits! fixed the hp Glitch For not seeing your hits! Bonesack is now a RARE drop from crystal key chest And it gives extra overall bonuses! The Barrage Pack has returned and will be added to stores and drops soon. It is an uncommon drop from the crystal key chest Rock Crabs will drop Charm Packs occasionally, to help with your summoning Added fire cape, void gloves, and more to Items on Death kept Ava Attractor + comp cape bolt attraction! Rev Caves are now Multi And Wildy! exit teleports you to 24 wildy MULTI! Added 2 new bosses: Callisto (level 470) + Smoke Devil (level 160) Fixed colored dark bows - you can now use any arrows w/ them Added staff crowns to clan chat Renamed The Gates PK teleport to KBD Location Added the ability to make a full slayer helm ADDED TORMENTED DEMON MAPS!! Fixed Summoning Dupe! Fixed CALLISTO AND SMOKE DEMON NOT ATTACKING! Buffed callisto and smoke demon attacks! Fixed nex maps alittle. Fixed some Maps around the world. Fixed Max cape dupe. Fixed People being able to recover items and It would retrieve to bank dupe. Fixed the new silab cheat engine Fixed on the 13th Of July BEFORE THE TUTORIAL WAS RELEASED![/code]
[URL=http://minus.com/i/BCHdA0yr8fqT][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jBCHdA0yr8fqT.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/Y26AjRVVCYgF][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jY26AjRVVCYgF.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/bnkbDi6PrCXW1][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbnkbDi6PrCXW1.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/bcFyD9mmOzyma][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbcFyD9mmOzyma.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/FFJI1I0YcPym][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jFFJI1I0YcPym.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/3325a1YewOa7][IMG]http://i.minus.com/j3325a1YewOa7.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/J2nokjFWkD11][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jJ2nokjFWkD11.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/CECVJnRcy515][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jCECVJnRcy515.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/ZMaevvyShHyI][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jZMaevvyShHyI.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/i/ZVu8NRaYqrrY][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jZVu8NRaYqrrY.png[/img][/URL]
[B][I][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=7]http://www.zerix.net[/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B][/center]
